name: 8192 5x5 4x4 3x3
description:
The 2048 app is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

HOW TO PLAY:
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins!

To access Leaderboard, you will have to sign in Game Centre.

Features :-

- High score
- Leaderboard
- Clear and simple UI
- Game works for android 2.3.* and above devices

- 3 boards size: 3x3, 4x4. 5x5
- 3 types of game: Powers of 2, Powers of 3, Fibonacci
- 3 types of Theme!!!

This game is largely based on the popular web-based game 2048, by Gabriele Cirulli. You can find the original game at http://git.io/2048.
